verses.verse: It happened <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4046>plague,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5375>"Take<s%> a <S%H7218>census<s%> of all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> all who are able to <S%H3318>go<s%> forth to <S%H6635>war<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with them in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> by the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Take a <S%H6242>census,<s%> from twenty <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward;<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>" These are those that came <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben:<s%> of <S%H2585>Hanoch,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2599>Hanochites;<s%> of <S%H6396>Pallu,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6384>Palluites;<s%>
of <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2697>Hezronites;<s%> of <S%H3756>Carmi,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3757>Carmites.<s%>

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H7206>Reubenites;<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were <S%H705>forty<s%> - <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6396>Pallu:<s%> <S%H446>Eliab.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab:<s%> <S%H5241>Nemuel,<s%> and <S%H1885>Dathan,<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram.<s%> These are that <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> who were <S%H7148>called<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> who <S%H5327>strove<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and against <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in the <S%H5712>company<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> when they <S%H5327>strove<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%>

and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> its <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and swallowed them <S%H1104>up<s%> together with <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> when that <S%H5712>company<s%> <S%H4194>died;<s%> what time the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and they became a <S%H5251>sign.<s%>
<S%H1121>Notwithstanding,<s%> the sons of <S%H7141>Korah<s%> <S%H4191>didn't<s%> die.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> after their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H5241>Nemuel,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H5242>Nemuelites;<s%> of <S%H3226>Jamin,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3228>Jaminites;<s%> of <S%H3199>Jachin,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3200>Jachinites;<s%>
of <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2227>Zerahites;<s%> of <S%H7586>Shaul,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7587>Shaulites.<s%>
These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H8099>Simeonites,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> after their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H6827>Zephon,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6831>Zephonites;<s%> of <S%H2291>Haggi,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2291>Haggites;<s%> of <S%H7764>Shuni,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7765>Shunites;<s%>
of <S%H244>Ozni,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H244>Oznites;<s%> of <S%H6179>Eri,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6180>Erites;<s%>
of <S%H720>Arod,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H722>Arodites;<s%> of <S%H692>Areli,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H692>Arelites.<s%>

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> according to those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H705>them,<s%> forty <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> <S%H6147>Er<s%> and <S%H209>Onan;<s%> and <S%H6147>Er<s%> and <S%H209>Onan<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%> <S%H7956>were:<s%> of Shelah, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8024>Shelanites;<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6558>Perezites;<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2227>Zerahites.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%> <S%H2696>were:<s%> of Hezron, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2697>Hezronites;<s%> of <S%H2538>Hamul,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2539>Hamulites.<s%>

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H7657>them,<s%> seventy - six <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> after their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H8439>Tola,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8440>Tolaites;<s%> of <S%H6312>Puvah,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6324>Punites;<s%>
of <S%H3437>Jashub,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3432>Jashubites;<s%> of <S%H8110>Shimron,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8117>Shimronites.<s%>

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> according to those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H8346>them,<s%> sixty - <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> after their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H5624>Sered,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H5625>Seredites;<s%> of <S%H356>Elon,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H440>Elonites;<s%> of <S%H3177>Jahleel,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3178>Jahleelites.<s%>

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H2075>Zebulunites<s%> according to those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H8346>them,<s%> sixty <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> after their <S%H4940>families:<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh:<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4354>Machirites;<s%> and <S%H4353>Machir<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead;<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1569>Gileadites.<s%>

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead:<s%> of <S%H372>Iezer,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H373>Iezerites;<s%> of <S%H2507>Helek,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2516>Helekites;<s%>
and <S%H844>Asriel,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H845>Asrielites;<s%> and <S%H7928>Shechem,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7930>Shechemites;<s%>
and <S%H8061>Shemida,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8062>Shemidaites;<s%> and <S%H2660>Hepher,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2662>Hepherites.<s%>

<S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher<s%> had no <S%H1121>sons,<s%> but <S%H1323>daughters:<s%> and the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%> were <S%H4244>Mahlah,<s%> and <S%H5270>Noah,<s%> <S%H2295>Hoglah,<s%> <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> and <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%>

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh;<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> after their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H7803>Shuthelah,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8364>Shuthelahites;<s%> of <S%H1071>Becher,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1076>Becherites;<s%> of <S%H8465>Tahan,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8470>Tahanites.<s%>
These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7803>Shuthelah:<s%> of <S%H6197>Eran,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6198>Eranites.<s%>

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> according to those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H7970>them,<s%> thirty - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%> These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> after their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> after their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1108>Belaites;<s%> of <S%H788>Ashbel,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H789>Ashbelites;<s%> of <S%H297>Ahiram,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H298>Ahiramites;<s%>
of <S%H8197>Shephupham,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7781>Shuphamites;<s%> of <S%H2349>Hupham,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2350>Huphamites.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela<s%> were <S%H714>Ard<s%> and <S%H5283>Naaman:<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H716>Ardites;<s%> of <S%H5283>Naaman,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H5280>Naamites.<s%>

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> after their <S%H4940>families;<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were <S%H705>forty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> after their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H7748>Shuham,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7749>Shuhamites.<s%> These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> after their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

All the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H7749>Shuhamites,<s%> according to those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H8346>them,<s%> were sixty - <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> after their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H3232>Imnah,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3232>Imnites;<s%> of <S%H4940>Ishvi,<s%> the family of the <S%H3441>Ishvites;<s%> of <S%H1283>Beriah,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1284>Berites.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1283>Beriah:<s%> of <S%H2268>Heber,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2277>Heberites;<s%> of <S%H4439>Malchiel,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4440>Malchielites.<s%>
The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> was <S%H8294>Serah.<s%>

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> according to those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H2572>them,<s%> fifty - <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> after their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H3183>Jahzeel,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3184>Jahzeelites;<s%> of <S%H1476>Guni,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1477>Gunites;<s%>
of <S%H3337>Jezer,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3340>Jezerites;<s%> of <S%H8006>Shillem,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8016>Shillemites.<s%>

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families;<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were <S%H705>forty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

These are those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>one<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"To these the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H2505>divided<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names.<s%>

To the <S%H7235>more<s%> you shall give the <S%H7235>more<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and to the <S%H4592>fewer<s%> you shall give the <S%H4591>less<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> to <S%H376>everyone<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of him shall his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> be <S%H5414>given.<s%>

<S%H776>Notwithstanding,<s%> the land shall be <S%H2505>divided<s%> by <S%H1486>lot:<s%> according to the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> they shall <S%H5157>inherit.<s%>
<S%H6310>According<s%> to the <S%H1486>lot<s%> shall their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> be <S%H2505>divided<s%> between the <S%H7227>more<s%> and the <S%H4592>fewer.<s%>"

These are those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> after their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites;<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites;<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4848>Merarites.<s%>

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H3881>Levi:<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3846>Libnites,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2276>Hebronites,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4250>Mahlites,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4188>Mushites,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7145>Korahites.<s%> <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6019>Amram.<s%>

The <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H6019>Amram<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> was <S%H3115>Jochebed,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> who was <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H3878>Levi<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H6019>Amram<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> their <S%H269>sister.<s%>
To <S%H175>Aaron<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar.<s%>
<S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> when they <S%H7126>offered<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> every <S%H2145>male<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward:<s%> for they were not <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> because there was no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> them <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

But among these there was not a <S%H376>man<s%> of them who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> by <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> who <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H4191>them,<s%> They shall surely <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%> There was not <S%H3498>left<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3612>them,<s%> except Caleb the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>
